rules.name: hopperMinecartItemTransfer
rules.description: Allows Hopper Minecarts to transfer items into containers below them.

rules.name: dispensersFillMinecarts
rules.description: Minecarts can be filled with hoppers, chests, tnt and furnace.

rules.name: doubleRetraction
rules.description: Re-adds 1.8 double retraction to pistons.
extras: Gives pistons the ability to double retract without side effects.
Fixes [MC-88959](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-88959).

rules.name: spiderJockeysDropGapples
rules.description: Gives Spider jockeys a specified chance to drop enchanted golden apples.
extras: 0 is the default setting, no enchanted golden apples will be dropped
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 100

rules.name: variableWoodDelays
rules.description: Variable delays on wooden components (buttons, pressure plates).

rules.name: betterBonemeal
rules.description: Bonemeal can be used to grow sugarcane, cactus and lily pads.

rules.name: dragonEggBedrockBreaking
rules.description: Reintroduce the Dragon Egg Bedrock breaking bug from 1.12.

rules.name: mobInFireConvertsSandToSoulsand
rules.description: If a living entity dies on sand with fire on top the sand will convert into soul sand.

rules.name: dispensersUseCauldrons
rules.description: Dispensers can empty/fill cauldrons with buckets or bottles, and undye leather armor/shulker boxes/banners

rules.name: autoCraftingDropper
rules.description: Auto-crafting dropper
extras: If a dropper points into a crafting table and contains a valid 3x3 crafting recipe, firing that
dropper will cause it to craft (drop as item) that recipe.
Overrides comparators so they indicate number of filled slots instead.
Also makes hoppers, droppers and dispensers input max 1 item per slot.

rules.name: dispensersToggleThings
rules.description: Dispensers containing a stick can toggle/activate things.
extras: Works with buttons, redstone, noteblocks, comparators, repeaters,
daylight detectors, etc.

rules.name: dispensersFeedAnimals
rules.description: Dispensers can feed animals if given their breeding item.
extras: Can also feed flowers to brown mooshrooms to give them a suspicious stew effect

rules.name: reloadSuffocationFix
rules.description: Won't let mobs glitch into blocks when reloaded.
extras: Can cause slight differences in mobs behaviour.
Fixes [MC-2025](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-2025).

rules.name: emptyShulkerBoxStackAlways
rules.description: Empty Shulker Boxes will always stack, even inside inventories.

rules.name: dispensersMilkAnimals
rules.description: Dispensers with empty buckets can milk cows/mooshrooms/goats, and get mushroom/suspicious stew from mooshrooms with bowls.

rules.name: fallingBlockDispensers
rules.description: Dispensers/Droppers with a block in front of them when powered will turn that block into a falling block
extras: dispenser & dropper give the same velocity to the falling block like they do in 22w13oneblockatatime

rules.name: renewableEndstone
rules.description: Dragon's breath from dispensers convert cobblestone to end stone.

rules.name: dispensersTillSoil
rules.description: Dispensers with hoes can till soil.

rules.name: renewableSand
rules.description: Cobblestone crushed by falling anvils makes sand.

rules.name: dispensersPotPlants
rules.description: Dispensers can put flowers in flower pots

rules.name: renewableIce
rules.description: Multiple ice crushed by falling anvils make denser ice.
extras: frosted turns into normal, normal into packed and packed into blue

rules.name: renewableWitherSkeletons
rules.description: Skeletons turn into wither skeletons when struck by lightning.

rules.name: y0DragonEggBedrockBreaking
rules.description: Let dragon eggs break Y0 bedrock.
extras: Requires dragonEggBedrockBreaking to be set to true.

rules.name: disablePlayerCollision
rules.description: Disables player entity collision.

rules.name: dispensersStripBlocks
rules.description: Dispensers with axes can strip blocks
extras: Can strip logs, remove oxidation, and remove wax

rules.name: dispenserPlacesBlocks
rules.description: Dispensers can place blocks.

rules.name: clericsFarmWarts
rules.description: Clerics can warm nether farts.
extras: This will also allow them to pick up wart items, as well as pathfind to soulsand.

rules.name: commandPing
rules.description: Enables `/ping` for players to get their ping.

rules.name: straySpawningInIgloos
rules.description: Only strays spawn in igloos.

rules.name: blockStateSyncing
rules.description: Fixes block states in F3 debug mode not updating for some blocks.
extras: May cause increased network traffic.
Works with cactus, sugar cane, saplings, hoppers, dispensers and droppers.

rules.name: repeaterPriorityFix
rules.description: Quick pulses won't get lost in repeater setups.
extras: Probably brings back pre 1.8 behaviour.
Fixes [MC-54711](https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-54711).

rules.name: maxSpongeRange
rules.description: Maximum offset limit for sponge.

rules.name: dispensersPlaceBoatsOnIce
rules.description: Dispensers can place boats on ice

rules.name: comparatorBetterItemFrames
rules.description: Allows Comparators to see item frames that are horizontal in front of them and on top the the block in front of them
extras: Behind: Allows comparators to detect item frames in the block behind them
Lenient: Allows comparators to detect any item frames within the block behind a full block
Extended: Allows comparators to detect item frames on a full block behind the comparator

rules.name: accurateBlockPlacement
rules.description: Client can provide alternative block placement.

rules.name: maxSpongeSuck
rules.description: Maximum water sucking for sponge.

rules.name: scaffoldingDistance
rules.description: Max distance for scaffolding.
validators: You must choose a value from 0 to 7

rules.name: pistonRedirectsRedstone
rules.description: Pistons and sticky pistons redirect redstone
extras: When retracting, they will blink visually
but that's only to minimize changes required for it to work

rules.name: dispensersCarvePumpkins
rules.description: Dispensers containing shears can carve pumpkins.

rules.name: comparatorReadsClock
rules.description: Allows Comparators to read the daytime instead of the rotation of clocks in item frames.

rules.name: flowerPotChunkLoading
rules.description: Placing a wither rose in a flowerpot will load that chunk.
extras: If u enable the rule the already existing chunks with flowerpots won't be loaded.
Also disabling the carpet rule won't remove the loaded chunks, u need to manually unload them using the /forceload command.
All the loaded chunks can be seen using `/forceload query`

rules.name: renewableNetherrack
rules.description: Fire charges from dispensers convert cobblestone to netherrack.
extras: Credits: Skyrising

rules.name: enderPearlChunkLoading
rules.description: Allow horizontally moving Ender Pearls to load chunks as entity ticking.

rules.name: blazeMeal
rules.description: Blaze powder fertilizes netherwart.
extras: Via dispenser or player right click actions.

rules.name: chickenShearing
rules.description: Chickens can be sheared to get feathers. Beware! every time u shear a chicken, it gets damaged!
extras: Baby chickens can't be sheared.
Also works with dispensers

rules.name: creeperSpawningInJungleTemples
rules.description: Only creepers spawn in jungle temples.
